These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. The company also announced that starting April 4, Larry Page, Google Co-Founder, will take charge of company's day-to-day operations as CEO. Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman.
